alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 07 at 2:09PM MDT until May 08 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...The eastern Magic Valley, the lower and upper Snake River plain, the Arco area and Mud Lake desert, and the Shoshone area and nearby Lava Beds. This includes the towns and cities Saint Anthony, Rexburg, Idaho Falls, Shelley, Blackfoot, Fort Hall, Pocatello, Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, and Oakley. It also includes the Idaho National Laboratory and Craters of the Moon National Monument. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM MDT Monday. The Frost area will start in the northern end of the Snake River plain and expand southward and westward until reaching the eastern Magic Valley. After sunrise, the area of frost formation will stop, this time shrinking from southwest to northeast across the affected area. Frost should be limited to the upper Snake River plain on Monday night. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Upper Snake River Plain
